choiceInteraction.label: Choice Interaction
choiceInteraction.description: Select a single (radio buttons) or multiple (check boxes) responses among a set of choices.

orderInteraction.label: Order Interaction
orderInteraction.description: Arrange a list of choices in the correct order.

associateInteraction.label: Associate Interaction
associateInteraction.description: Create pair(s) from a series of choices.

matchInteraction.label: Match Interaction
matchInteraction.description: Create association(s) between two sets of choices displayed in a table (row and column).

hottextInteraction.label: Hottext Interaction
hottextInteraction.description: Select one or more text parts (hottext) within a text.

gapMatchInteraction.label: Gap Match Interaction
gapMatchInteraction.description: Fill in the gaps in a text from a set of choices.

sliderInteraction.label: Slider Interaction
sliderInteraction.description: Select a value within a numerical range.

extendedTextInteraction.label: Extended Text Interaction
extendedTextInteraction.description: Collect open-ended information in one or more text area(s) (strings or numeric values).

uploadInteraction.label: File Upload Interaction
uploadInteraction.description: Upload a file (e.g. document, picture...) as a response.

mediaInteraction.label: Media Interaction
mediaInteraction.description: Control the playing parameters (auto-start, loop) of a video or audio file and report the number of time it has been played.

_container.label: Text Block
_container.description: Block contains the content (stimulus) of the item such as text or image. It is also required for Inline Interactions.

inlineChoiceInteraction.label: Inline Choice Interaction
inlineChoiceInteraction.description: Select a choice from a drop-down list.

textEntryInteraction.label: Text Entry Interaction
textEntryInteraction.description: Collect open-ended information in a short text input (strings or numeric values).

endAttemptInteraction.label: End Attempt Interaction
endAttemptInteraction.description: Trigger the end of the item attempt.

hotspotInteraction.label: Hotspot Interaction
hotspotInteraction.description: Select one or more areas (hotspots) displayed on an picture.

graphicOrderInteraction.label: Graphic Order Interaction
graphicOrderInteraction.description: Order the areas (hotspots) displayed on a picture.

graphicAssociateInteraction.label: Graphic Associate Interaction
graphicAssociateInteraction.description: Create association(s) between areas (hotspots) displayed on a picture.

graphicGapMatchInteraction.label: Graphic Gap Match Interaction
graphicGapMatchInteraction.description: Fill in the gaps on a picture with a set of image choices.

selectPointInteraction.label: Select Point Interaction
selectPointInteraction.description: Position one or more points on a picture (response areas are not displayed).

customInteraction.likertScaleInteraction.label: Likert Scale
customInteraction.likertScaleInteraction.description: A simple implementation of likert scale.

customInteraction.liquidsInteraction.label: Liquids
customInteraction.liquidsInteraction.description: A simple implementation of SBAC liquids.
